messages.title: Your local voice, backing Brexit, backing Boris.
messages.content: Help me Get Brexit Done and deliver for Gedling.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ensure that Gedling's vote to Leave, ignored by Labour, is acted on. Only the Conservatives can deliver Brexit.
Recruit Gedling's fair share of the 20,000 extra police, ensuring strong sentencing and a clear message to criminals.
Build on record levels of employment, attracting investment and jobs to Gedling.
Investment in local NHS services and staff, securing funding for the NHS in Gedling.
Ensure schools have the chance to succeed with the Conservatives' £14 billion cash injection.
Preserve green spaces. Incentivize developers to build on derelict or unused land first.

issues.brexitEurope: Ensure that Gedling's vote to Leave is acted on.
issues.economy: Attracting investment and jobs to Gedling.
issues.education: Secure schools' chance to succeed with £14 billion cash injection.
issues.environment: Preserve green spaces, incentivize building on derelict or unused land.
issues.health: Investment in local NHS services and staff, securing funding.

housing.content: Preserve green spaces, incentivize building on derelict or unused land.
